website_summaries.verdict: A stylish, well-made cast iron umbrella stand, but it may not be heavy enough to stand up to high winds.
pros: Accommodates umbrella poles ranging from 1.375- to 1.5-inch diameters
Choose from black or bronze finish
Sturdy construction that can hold up under most conditions
cons: The base may not be strong enough to hold the umbrella up in high winds

customer_reviews.title: Crooked
customer_reviews.text: This unit comes in two pieces: the cast iron base and the pole support. The pole support is threaded on the base end and it screws into the base. Unfortunately, on the unit I received the threads were welded very crooked so the support pole is then crooked. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip J

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking but Could Be Stronger
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very well packaged. Is very attractive. Our 1.5 inch diameter umbrella shaft fit in perfectly. It's doing a good job in the wind. There are pads on the bottom, so it's easy to slide it to a different position on our tile patio. Update: The whole stand tipped over in a gust today while the umbrella was tilted 45 degrees. Also the single screw pin which is supposed to keep the umbrella from moving in the stand is not strong enough to hold it tight. Had to downgrade to four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and need Replaced/Returned but not an option
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella stand to go with the umbrella I bought. Upon opening the package I noticed the only thing that was in the box was this base. There should be a sleeve for the umbrella to fit into. It is impossible for the umbrella to attach using only this part. When I went to review this order under my Amazon account there is not an option for a return or replace of an item. This was an expensive purchase and it is very bad business to not replace this item, especially when it was the manufactures error.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Chick 2 Pits

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how hard it would be to find a good old-fashioned cast iron base for my patio umbrella, because it's been years since I bought my last one. A plastic base, available everywhere, just wasn't going to suffice for my beautiful new deck and dining set. This is beautiful and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be heavier.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but needs to be heavier. Wind easily took the umbrella and base. It was a light gust.
customer_reviews.author: Junior1773

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Solid, sturdy and well made. Many of the stands I researched on Amazon seemed to have a consistent problem in that they would chip apart or actually break in half. Not a problem with this one as it's made of iron! It's not a complicated product obviously, but it seems like there are a lot of similar, but inferior ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Shimshaman

customer_reviews.title: Great stand. Not Super study but very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice umbrella base, however, our umbrella did end up blowing over in the crazy Southern California winds several times and the umbrella eventually broke as a result. So my advice is that this stand is great, but when its extremely windy, take the umbrella out because the base isn't heavy enough to withstand extreme weather/wind issues. Overall we really like it and would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: NJS31

customer_reviews.title: I thought they were great. They look good and are heavy enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these umbrella stands a year ago. When I first got them, I thought they were great. They look good and are heavy enough to keep a large umbrella upright. The reason I give them 2 stars is because of the horrible paint job. It looked good at first, but now all three stands are rusting significantly. They are rusting so bad that there are now rust spots on my pool deck. So, now I have to treat the rust and repaint the stands. I would have given these stands 5 stars if the paint held up.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Check your measurements carefully. It is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this wrought iron umbrella stand. When it arrived, it was bigger and heavier than I expected. It wouldn't fit under our table. All it took was a husband with a hack saw to make me a happy girl. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Quality product. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Classy looking. Nice matte finish. Satisfactory weight to sturdily secure our 7.5 ft. umbrella. We are awaiting a four- chair larger patio table, and I think it will look even nicer when the pole & weight are centered within a larger outdoor patio table! I appreciate how it securely stands alone if you want to simply place umbrellas about your patio or deck! Update: We received and assembled our patio table. The umbrella weight fit just fine underneath and complements the decor of our new table and chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy🌼

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy. Will not hold to minor gusts.
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy, will not hold down a rolled down umbrella in the slightest wind gusts. Now I have to purchase another $60+ umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jones

customer_reviews.title: THE POST THAT IS TO BE SCREWED INTO BASE ARRIVED BENT : (
customer_reviews.text: I AM HAVING TO RETURN THIS IN EXCHANGE FOR ANOTHER. I JUST OPENED THE BOX LIFTED THE BASE OUT & THEN WAS ABOUT TO SCREW THE POST INTO THE BASE WHEN I NOTED TWO SUBTLE FLAWS 1. A "LEANING-OFF CENTER" SCREW POST 2. A FLAWED CAST AT THE BOTTOM OF THE TUBE (MAKING AN IMPERFECT ROUND) THE POST WOULD NOT COMPLETE 1 TURN INTO BASE-& I QUICKLY PACKED IT BACK UP. I HOPE THE REPLACEMENT DOES NOT ARRIVE WITH THE SAME PROBLEMS!
customer_reviews.author: Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Very solid and well-made
customer_reviews.text: I am using this stand to hold a standard-size folding umbrella in order to shade my vegetable plants in a tiered raised bed, when the afternoon sun is hottest on the hottest days. I am not using this stand under a metal picnic table with a hold for the umbrella pole. The weight of this stand (metal, resin-coated) was a plus. I am using it with a Rhino 18-inch square zippered bag which holds 50 pounds of sand. The combination of the weight bag and the stand has been very stable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Dible

customer_reviews.title: Welded crooked, umbrella leans.
customer_reviews.text: The tube that holds the umbrella is welded crooked. Now my umbrella leans. Where can I get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M

customer_reviews.title: Description is incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid, appears to be well made. Taking a star off because the description states that it will hold poles up to 1-7/8" in diameter, and this is not true. The pole I am using is 1-5/8", and even that diameter will require me to grind down 4 small spot welds inside the base tube. I would estimate anything over 1-1/2" will require this modification. The black plastic ring they ship to seal the top of the base tube will not fit over my pole either, so will have to stay off when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Good Average Weight
customer_reviews.text: Stabilizes 9’ umbrella (in patio table) most days. However, when slight winds pick up, the umbrella leans as weight lifts up and tilts on the ground. Need weight bags or similar on top of it for windy days-definitely if standing independently (not into a table). Comes with a movable ring so different size umbrella poles can fit nicely. Very pretty looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jill C

customer_reviews.title: This is the best. I originally had a sand filled plastic umbrella ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. I originally had a sand filled plastic umbrella stand that was awful. I saw this one and thought I'd give it a try. I was not at all disappointed. It is heavy, attractive and keeps my umbrella right where it needs to be. I bought a second umbrella and now have 2 of these stands. It is that good.
customer_reviews.author: Renae B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Stand
customer_reviews.text: Looking at the many options to hold our large umbrella we found this one made of metal and had a nice design. The wind picks up around here quite a bit and this was wide at the base. I added a base weight bag with sand to bump up the weight another 50 pounds for extra security around our pool. This is a solid metal stand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: NICE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my stand alone patio umbrella. Very easy to put together. Thought it weighed enough to hold up the umbrella, but we had some strong winds and the umbrella blew over twice. It has little feet under the bottom which I like, so it can move easily and does not stain my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Good stand
customer_reviews.text: The screw from the pole support to the base is crooked, making the entire umbrella look crooked. Update: I emailed the manufacturer directly and they sent a new pole support the same day. Looks good now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY (but that's good)
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and HEAVY, which is exactly what you want from a patio umbrella stand. We don't bring our umbrella in anymore, except during the strongest wind and storms.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: Your umbrella won't take off for Oz with this umbrella base attached!
customer_reviews.text: It's really heavy. Looks nice. If I was stronger, maneuverability wouldn't be an issue. Installing the tube to the base was a little squirrely because the tube looked like it leaned, but when I put a level on it, it WAS level. I can't say anything about durability, because I just received it today. I don't think that would be an issue, as the powdercoat is nice and even. Should last longer than me!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great if a crooked umbrella is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This would be beautiful but top piece that screws into base screws in super crooked. I am trying to replace it and a new one will come Aug 25th but this one needs to be returned by Aug 11. Next one may be worse. Seller please contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella stand!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice umbrella stand. It would work perfect for me, except it doesn't work with my table. The tube that comes up from the stand, will not fit into the section on my table. I am trying to decide if I can alter the opening of my table base, or if I need to send it back. I had no idea to check this before ordering. UPDATE: July 1, 2018: We altered our table base to accommodate this umbrella stand! We could not be happier! Works great! Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: GREAT UMBRELLA STAND
customer_reviews.text: We just received the umbrella stand and we are very happy with it. I really like the size of this stand. I like the smaller size because there is less of a chance of tripping over. The color is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a great umbrella stand. You get what you pay for and this is not as inexpensive as some that I looked at Home Depot, but it's way better. Prettier too which is a plus. I like that it's round and not square.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and holds 9 foot umbrella well
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty pricey in my opinion, but it looks great and holds outdoor 9 foot diameter umbrella well. But the last time I bought a' wrought iron stand was like 25 years ago so I guess prices have gone up! Once you buy it though, its not like you ever have to buy another one. No rust so far and I don't expect any. Looks great and I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia WTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Nice Base!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with base. I do not have any issue with pole not being straight like other reviewers. Mine is fine. Worth the $$$, so far. Only minor issue was packaging was cheap. Just a pile of styrofoam when I opened box.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This is much better than the lighter and cheaper ones available at our ...
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy and stable enough to support our umbrella without tipping. This is a very attractive umbrella base. The base is fairly wide so it only fits under one of our tables due to the table leg shape so make sure you look at your table before ordering. Would definitely purchase again. This is much better than the lighter and cheaper ones available at our local home supply store.
customer_reviews.author: kirstin

customer_reviews.title: Good looks for the value
customer_reviews.text: Bought to add more shade so we can have social distance areas. Looks more expensive than it is. Very easy to move around patio. May even buy another because it looks so good.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Seidenbusch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: The TropiShade 30-Pound Bronze Powder-Coated Cast Iron Umbrella Stand has provided the sturdiness to support the open umbrella even in strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: RoRyan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave the umbrella in the stand between uses.
customer_reviews.text: First day having it setup a gust of wind knocked the umbrella down and the umbrella was in the down position. Just glad it didn’t hit the window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weight
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a solid metal one like my old one. This is not as big and heavy as my old one. I do not think they make them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Taller than they describe!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot use it under any of my patio tables, it stands taller than they originally indicated when I ordered it. Stands 16 inches tall the new diagram indicates 15 inches tall. It was not in stock when I ordered it but the original height in its description was shorter.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this to work. The price to ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work. The price to insert the pile into is too tall to fit under my bistro table and not adjustable. It did not seem supportive enough to be freestanding with a 9 ft umbrella in a space where my children will be running around, so it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Scardullo

customer_reviews.title: very weak I bought two and in just 10 days ...
customer_reviews.text: very weak I bought two and in just 10 days one is bent from very mild breeze - very cheap materials
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move but tippy
customer_reviews.text: Decent look and easy enough to move around, but the umbrella in this base routinely gets blown down.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Hetzner

customer_reviews.title: Saturday, attractive and well made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the TropiShade 30lb umbrella holder around 4 month ago and it has exceeded my expectations. It’s very attractive, sturdy and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MSN

customer_reviews.title: Base
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this base for an umbrella with a 2" pole and discovered we didn't read the description well enough. It didn't work for that particular umbrella but we kept it for another smaller umbrella with a 1.5" pole. We love it. It is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Lovely addition to our patio
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful design, heavy enough to stay in place and keep our umbrella upright.
customer_reviews.author: Calm_dn

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to keep umbrella in place with our high winds! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanny

customer_reviews.title: Has not blown over yet
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice, quality product. Much nicer than the plastic, water filled ones.
customer_reviews.author: T&S

customer_reviews.title: great base as long as you do not bend your ...
customer_reviews.text: great base as long as you do not bend your umbrella. really nice color! our umbrella bends to block the western sun and this base couldn't hold it, but when left open straight is was great!
customer_reviews.author: M.Nowak

customer_reviews.title: Great quality metal umbrella stand
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very nice design; one of the only stands available in metal so don't have to worry about composite cracking or chipping.
customer_reviews.author: Youngz

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella stand
customer_reviews.text: good looking solid and strong best umbrella stand I have ever had I would recommend highly .
customer_reviews.author: Jmgriffon

customer_reviews.title: Our umbrella would not fit in the stand hole.
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella would not fit in stand hole. They could easily supply 2 stand brackets which screw into base and fix this!
customer_reviews.author: Len Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Packaging insured safe arrival. Very happy with product and transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron, 30#, easy to assemble, good casting and nice finish.
customer_reviews.text: Like the open design and the weight. Used as patio umbrella base for circular patio table with glass top and hole in center.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive this product for free or any endorsements for my review. Heavy duty umbrella stand that will stand independently. Solid build to it. Wont rust. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: William Courage

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED!
customer_reviews.text: NOT AS LISTED..."Base is compatible with 1 3/8" and 1 1/2" umbrella poles" ... My barely 1 1/2 " umbrella pole DOES NOT FIT!!! Unfortunately, I have already spray painted the base another color so I am unable to return this product, but I AM VERY DISPLEASED!!!! PLEASE NOTE attached picture showing that the base opening is just a little more than 1 1/4" and not near the 1 1/2" opening as CLAIMED...This umbrella stand is ALSO ADVERTISED (one of my reasons for purchasing) as an "AMAZON'S CHOICE".....SHAME....SHAME...SHAME!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frosty

customer_reviews.title: I like it. it works
customer_reviews.text: what does one really say about an umbrella stand that will sit under my table and rarely be seen? I like it. it works. I've not had any umbrella slip from cross winds when using.
customer_reviews.author: d funk

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella stand 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! Easy to move...looks great, very sturdy. Ideal for our use!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Keil

customer_reviews.title: I bought two, One was OK. But the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, One was OK. But the second one was not. The tube screws into the base and the second one was not upright. They do hold the umbrellas OK - though the second one is tilted due to the tube not being upright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty umbrella stands. Very nice and easy to place umbrella in.
customer_reviews.author: 1inablumoon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but tall.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but tall. Would not fit under my lawn table and I had to design and make two inch spacers to go under the table legs in order to fit the stand and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Thule1

customer_reviews.title: Thought diameter was too small, then read product details
customer_reviews.text: Edited review. Thought base diameter was too small. No instructions included on assembly beyond warning not to cross-thread pole retaining insert. Discovered note to remove plastic sizing insert in product details to accommodate 1 1/2 inch umbrella pole. Secure fit now.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty stand. And easy enough to move around
customer_reviews.text: Pretty stand. And easy enough to move around. Also easy enough to slide the umbrella into which is very important
customer_reviews.author: vmm

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron and  looks Great on my deck!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for ,I wanted something that wouldn’t chip or crack like most of them out there . You pay for what you get!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: It's a good stand.
customer_reviews.text: Not the stands fault but the securing screw hits right on the table brace and you have to tip the table to tighten the umbrella in. I didn't realize this when I first set it up and overnight a breeze lifted the new umbrella out of the stand and over the deck rail.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but too light of weight
customer_reviews.text: You can easily pick up and move this base, it's only 30 lbs. The look is very nice, but with not a lot of wind, the umbrella tipped it over.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not good for strong winds
customer_reviews.text: We live off a Big Pond which make for very strong winds and this just didn't hold in place even with the umbrella close.
customer_reviews.author: Qugie

customer_reviews.title: Purdy and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Purchase together with Abba Patio 9-foot Umbrella. Made a perfect father's day gift. It has withstood a few thunderstorms without tipping over. Very sturdy and looks great under the glass table.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella base, ugly bronze color
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella base, but Bronze is more of a chocolate ice cream color and not very pretty. Purchased appropriate paint and spray painted a much better color. Still a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri Shopper 2016

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to use. Very attractive. A little lighter than my bronze table but blends in.
customer_reviews.author: Barb in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish umbrella stand.
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy umbrella stand. Love it, and it seems like it will last a while. 4 stars because mine seems just a little crooked, still happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and sturdy. Waiting to see how it will hold up with the rain, hoping it won’t rust.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: High Quality  materials..
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty no worries about filling the base with water or Sand. Painted it with Rustolem Hammered Bronze for protection.. Came out Amazing..
customer_reviews.author: ATRU20

customer_reviews.title: Well built product.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for some time and it is solid and held up well.
customer_reviews.author: jr ott

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy, umbrella stands for patio umbrella's. They drain nicely so you don't have to worry about them filling up with water and rusting if you've taken the umbrella down due to high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Base is not super heavy, so umbrella needs to be closed in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated. Base is not super heavy, so umbrella needs to be closed in strong wind.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Abelson

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella stand is very good quality and beautiful as well. Very sturdy, well made and we know it will hold up our umbrella through windy weather. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Shennan

customer_reviews.title: Great weight for holding up umbrella on windy days
customer_reviews.text: Great weight for holding up umbrella on windy days. Can't give it 5 stars because it does bleed rust marks on the patio. Not a huge concern because I don't intend to move it around and I can deal with one spot of rust.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Good stand for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking umbrella base.....appears well made. I worry a little that 30 lbs may be a tad light ....even with umbrella closed I can imagine some wobble in a bad wind.....(.my other base weighs around 50 lbs) ...but at least it is easy to move around .
customer_reviews.author: MarkZ06

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY BASE.
customer_reviews.text: Wide heavy base. Nice color brown. So far holding my 9ft canvas market umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Rob

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely umbrella stand. It's large and sturdy and very heavy - heavy enough that your umbrella is unlikely to land in your pool or neighbor's yard if a strong wind kicks up. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Had to cut down the umbrella so it ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Had to cut down the umbrella so it would fit under the table. Still beautiful. Would buy again. We get a lot of wind. So far, it's held.
customer_reviews.author: L. Warburton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality umbrella stand. Heavy and nice antique look. No complaints on purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was glad I found his here on Amazon. The stand is sturdy and holds our umbrella well and that's without a table. I'm not yet sure if the stand can hold when it's windy and umbrella is folded up. Hopefully even when it's windy the stand will hold.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Alcoba

customer_reviews.title: Best rated umbrella base for a reason!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, very heavy, looks great. Also, comes with a plastic circle piece at the top and that makes it so a standard 9ft umbrella fits right in without it being able to wiggle around, if that makes any sense.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Kim

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella stand such a beautiful design an heavy enough to hold up in the wind
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid M

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Substantial
customer_reviews.text: Very substantial stand and so attractive. Had no problem setting it up. Would definitely purchase again. Needed a stand alone base for our umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought new patio furniture and needed a new umbrella stand. The is heavy and solid which is great. It looks great and matches the rest of my patio furnitire.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird2526

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought a very expensive patio umbrella that didn't come w/ a stand, so I was looking for a reasonably priced stand that would fit it. The umbrella is just a tad off center in the stand, but it's stable & sturdy, and the imperfection is acceptable to the perfectionist that I am.
customer_reviews.author: Angie F

customer_reviews.title: Strong & durable worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Only base I bought this summer that did not break! Stay away from clay,cast iron way to go
customer_reviews.author: susan j.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Purchased a patio umbrella and it holds ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Purchased a patio umbrella and it holds it securely. Heavy enough that it has with stood all it the strongest winds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does a great job of holding up our umbrella and matches well ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong, does a great job of holding up our umbrella and matches well with our castiron table. great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Summer
customer_reviews.text: Both items arrived on time and in good shape. They were as described, dark green for the umbrella and bronze for the stand. They are on the deck now.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Minnich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stand
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this stand after they sold out at the local store where I bought my patio umbrella. I was pleasantly surprised by the beauty and quality of the stand. It feels very sturdy for normal weather conditions.
customer_reviews.author: PNWmama15

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too light for heavy wind even with the umbrella closed.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Guizar

customer_reviews.title: Measure first!
customer_reviews.text: Nice stand but taller than expected. Our table is designed to fit an umbrella, but this one lifted the table off the ground an inch or two so we had to send back. Measure carefully. Great as a stand alone. Beautiful and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Heavy, well made and I can move it without me killing my self
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bojczak

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and craftsmanship, design and durability, perfect weight so umbrella cannot blow over in wind.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and craftsmanship, design and durability, perfect weight so umbrella unable to blow over in wind.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Girl

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. While these bases may be half the price elsewhere, the quality and design of TropiShade's is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Ma Zoan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our 1 and 1/2 inch umbrella did not fit in the pole. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Kane

customer_reviews.title: False advertising for an umbrella match
customer_reviews.text: This item was advertised as a base for the Tropishade 11 foot thatched umbrella but the umbrella did not fit. We had to go to four large retailers to find a base that fit the pole of the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Esses

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and sturdy which is what is needed for an umbrella base
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and sturdy which is what is needed for an umbrella base. Do Not get the concrete filled bases. This one worked great.
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, heavy (good) and arrived in great condition - this is a really great umbrella stand.
customer_reviews.author: James Archer

customer_reviews.title: Choice of stem height would be nice
customer_reviews.text: Well made. It'd be great if you had the option of different stem heights. This one wouldn't fit under the patio table.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: bad packing. the upright screws into the base and ...
customer_reviews.text: I so wish I had sent this back! could not find a appropriate box, it came in a huge box with some paper thrown in. bad packing. the upright screws into the base and the threaded part was welded on crooked, so it is crooked and will take some welding and a heavy duty vise to make it right!
customer_reviews.author: jenn S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: A substantial piece that is elegant and definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Suer

product_meta.title: TropiShade 30-Pound Bronze Powder-Coated Cast Iron Umbrella Stand
product_meta.description: Color:BronzeEnjoy outdoor lifestyle with this attractive antique bronze umbrella base. At 30 lbs. This umbrella stand is great for most applications. Simple and easy to use this universal umbrella stand will fit 1 3/8” and 1 1/2” umbrella poles. Cast iron and powder coating protect it from the elements. This umbrella base is strong and sturdy.
feature_bullets: Cast iron umbrella base wieghs 30 pounds with a bronze powder-coating.
One pole thumb screws secure umbrella in base
Base is compatible with 1 3/8" and 1 1/2" umbrella poles.
Search " tropishade " for a compatible umbrella
